item.title: Agent X: The VP's HQ
item.description: You’ll have to excuse the melodramatic nature of this one, it’s a great hidden room with an exceptional entrance but it can be a little over-the-top at times. The video below comes from the pilot episode of Agent X. In it, the newly appointed Vice President of the United States discovers the secret entrance to a hidden tunnel and subsequent hidden rooms within her new house. Video Images The seemingly inocuous wall containing the entrance to a secret tunnel and subsequent rooms.
